decks.notes: The focus of this Mono Black Control deck is to dominate the game through resource manipulation, powerful destruction spells, and the ability to outvalue opponents with card advantage and potent threats like Emrakul, the Promised End. With a mixture of targeted discard spells, removal spells, and powerful finishers, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while generating incremental advantages to overwhelm them in the late game. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Karn, the Great Creator and The One Ring offer additional utility and potent threats to further solidify the deck's control strategy.

This deck focuses on cycling through your deck quickly to get your combo pieces on the battlefield. The key is to manipulate your graveyard by cycling cards like Street Wraith and Architects of Will to eventually cast Living End, which will bring all your creatures back onto the battlefield, often overwhelming your opponent. Cards like Grief and Force of Negation help disrupt your opponent's game plan while Curator of Mysteries and Waker of Waves provide additional value. Overall, the deck aims to quickly set up its combo and outvalue the opponent.

This deck focuses on using a variety of creatures to tutor for specific cards and create powerful combos on the battlefield. By utilizing cards like Chord of Calling and Yawgmoth, Thran Physician, the deck can quickly assemble a potent board presence and overwhelm the opponent. The creatures in the deck serve as a toolbox, allowing for flexibility in responding to different situations and adapting to various strategies. With a mix of ramp, recursion, and disruption, this deck aims to outmaneuver opponents and secure victory through strategic plays and synergistic interactions.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay, utilizing a mix of creatures, spells, and lands to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The key strategy is to put pressure on the opponent early in the game, using cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Wild Nacatl to deal damage while also controlling the board with Leyline of the Guildpact and Stubborn Denial. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion provides additional flexibility and resources. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a relentless assault, ultimately securing victory through fast and decisive plays.
